receive-moonjellycandy.speaker: Lumi
receive-moonjellycandy.text: Oh…@ is that…@ moon jelly candy…?

options.text: Yeah. I remembered you said you liked it.
Thought you could use something sweet down here.
Don't worry, I didn't eat any… probably.

mooncandy1.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy1.text: Y-you actually found some…?@ No one's ever… brought me something like this before.

mooncandy1.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy1.text: It's glowing so gently… like a tiny piece of the surface light.@ It's beautiful.

options.text: Not as beautiful as the one holding it.
You really like shiny things, huh?

mooncandy-tease.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy-tease.text: H-hey!@ You shouldn't joke about that!@ This is…@ special.

options.text: I know. That's why it's for you.

mooncandy2.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy2.text: You're always saying things like that…@ and I never know what to say back.

options.text: Just say what you feel.
Then don't say anything. Just smile.

mooncandy3.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy3.text: What I feel…?@ I… I feel warm.@ Even down here in the cold.@ That's not supposed to happen.

options.text: Maybe that's what love feels like.
Guess I'm good at breaking the rules.

mooncandy4.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy4.text: L-love?!@ You… you can't just say that so suddenly…!

mooncandy4.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy4.text: But… maybe you're right.@ Because every time you come close, my light gets brighter…@ and I can't stop it.

options.text: Then don't stop it.
I like seeing you shine.

mooncandy5.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy5.text: You really mean it… don't you?@ You're not afraid of the dark.@ Not even of me.

mooncandy5.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy5.text: Then… I won't hide anymore.@ Not from you.

options.text: Lumi…

mooncandy6.speaker: Narrator
mooncandy6.text: Her lure brightens softly, painting the dark with gentle light.@ It feels calm. Safe. Warm.

mooncandy6.speaker: Lumi
mooncandy6.text: I don't know what happens next…@ but… if you're here, I think I'll be okay.

get-item.speaker: Lumi
get-item.text: Here,@ take this.@ Its a glowrod.

get-item.speaker: Lumi
get-item.text: It will allow you to say in the dark like me...

options.text: Yeah. I remembered you said you liked it.
It reminded me of you.
Found it shining in the current. Figured you'd want it.

drift1.speaker: Lumi
drift1.text: You… remembered that?@ I didn't think anyone listened when I talked about things like that.

drift1.speaker: Lumi
drift1.text: It's beautiful.@ Look at how the water's worn it smooth.@ It used to be sharp… dangerous…@ and now it's gentle.

options.text: Kind of like you.
Funny how time can heal even glass.

drift2.speaker: Lumi
drift2.text: M-me?@ I'm not gentle.@ I just learned how to hide the sharp edges better.

options.text: You don't need to hide them from me.
Even sharp things can be beautiful.

drift3.speaker: Lumi
drift3.text: Beautiful…?@ You really think that?@ Even if I'm a little broken inside?

options.text: Especially because you are.
Everyone's a little broken. You just glow through it better.

drift4.speaker: Lumi
drift4.text: Heh…@ You really shouldn't say things like that.@ I don't know what to do when you look at me like that.

drift4.speaker: Lumi
drift4.text: When I hold this driftglass… it feels like I'm holding something that understands me.

options.text: Maybe that's because I understand you too.
Maybe you just needed someone to see you the way you see this glass.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: I… I think you might be right.@ Every time you visit, the dark doesn't feel so cold anymore.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: And now… it's like the pieces of me I tried to hide are glowing again.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: Here…@ take this.@ I've been saving it for someone special.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: It's a glowrod.@ It'll help you see in the dark like I do.@ Just don't forget where that light came from.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: When you hold it, maybe you'll think of me…@ like I'll think of you whenever I see the light move across the glass.

drift5.speaker: Lumi
drift5.text: You… really changed something in me.@ Thank you, for reminding me that broken things can shine again.

options.text: Yeah, thought you'd like it.

wrong1.speaker: Lumi
wrong1.text: I…@ see.@ It's… not what I expected.

options.text: You don't like it?
Come on, it's not that bad.

wrong2.speaker: Lumi
wrong2.text: It's not just that.@ It's…@ this thing… it hurts to look at.@ It feels… wrong.

wrong2.speaker: Lumi
wrong2.text: Did you even think before bringing it here?

wrong2.speaker: Lumi
wrong2.text: I thought… maybe you understood me.@ I guess I was wrong.

wrong3.speaker: Lumi
wrong3.text: You don't get it…@ do you?@ It's not about whether it's 'that bad'.@ It's about what it *means*.

wrong3.speaker: Lumi
wrong3.text: You brought the deep into my light and called it a gift.@ I… can't do this anymore.

wrong3.speaker: System
wrong3.text: [Your bond with Lumi has been broken.]

wrong-end.speaker: Lumi
wrong-end.text: I…@ need some time alone.@ Please.

wrong-end.speaker: System
wrong-end.text: [Your bond with Lumi has been broken.]
